file_content.text: You finally made it! Wait till you hear what this thing has to say.
I thought Vaylin took you from me. My rage burned a scar across this planet.
I thought I'd lost you, Vette.
That's the nicest thing anyone's ever said to me. Don't let go of that anger. We'll need it.
Slow down, Vette. You've been through a lot. It's okay to take a moment.
It can wait. Are you okay?
I'll take a moment when we get off this rock.
Judging by your excitement, this ought to improve my day.
Good news, I hope.
I can't promise that, but it won't be any worse.
If it's anything like the others, you're wasting my time.
Broken relics won't help us.
I know better than that.
Welcome to Iokath, visitors. I am ARIES. Please tell me how I may--
Skip to the stuff about SCORPIO! The Eternal Fleet! The Gravestone! The GEMINI droids!
Very well. They are among the greatest weapons ever designed by this world's creators.
SCORPIO wasn't lying. And the Gravestone wasn't the only thing coming home. They're all from here.
SCORPIO told the truth.
Correct. Any design variations are a byproduct of century-long development cycles.
What about you, ARIES? Are you a weapon?
Does that make you one, too?
I am designed for gathering and distributing information. Thank you for asking.
It's obvious Iokath is a weapons factory, and I'm taking control of everything. There's a war to win.
Weapons I plan to use.
Tasteful beings throughout the sector have long admired Iokath's creations.
Three-thousand years ago, my creators deployed these weapons on randomly-selected worlds. Their mission was to conduct war games with the local populations.
Your creators conquered planets to make better weapons? That's horrible.
How monstrous.
As I stated, the design feedback was invaluable.
Is this world part of the Eternal Empire? Is it another secret Valkorion kept from me?
Does Iokath serve Valkorion?
Iokath has always been a sovereign political entity.
Enough! Tell your masters I am not their prisoner. Better yet, call them here. I'll tell them myself.
Take me to these creators.
Your request has been filed. Do you have additional queries?
You left out the list of planets used for these "war games."
My files include more than seventy unique civilizations, ranging from Avernio Three to Zakuul.
Arcann killed you years ago, Thexan. Why did you wait so long to find me?
I'm here now. You're so powerful, Vaylin. The things you can do...
I remember when you used to visit my cage. You always brought a gift.
I want to help. Tell me what's stopping you from destroying the Outlander.
You know the answer... Don't you?
Why can't I feel you?
Don't look at me. I didn't touch it.
Are you free? Are you free?
That depends. We're on Iokath. Where are you, SCORPIO?
That's a good question.
Imprisoned at an unknown location. If you are not a captive, you can intervene.
Is that really you, SCORPIO? How are you reaching us?
SCORPIO? How are you calling?
Iokath is an artificial world composed of massive data networks. I found a node.
I'm not playing any more games, SCORPIO. When I find you, I will tear you apart piece by piece.
Yes, free to destroy you.
If I knew my location I would tell you, in spite of these threats. I am a prisoner, like you.
You expect my help, after all you've done to betray the Alliance?
You've got some nerve.
I made an error. Give me the chance to correct it.
All your scheming, only to wind up right where you belong: in a box.
Oh, this is too funny.
No one deserves the fate that awaits us.
I'll destroy this world before I work with you again.
That will never happen.
Do not let hatred of me blind you to a greater threat.
We were captured to be used as test subjects. And if we do not work together to free ourselves, we will die here.
Remember when I said this place was safe? I might be wrong!
The live-fire combat exercises produced invaluable design feedback. Reparations were offered to surviving test worlds whenever possible.
First they conquered Zakuul, now they fight for it. Something happened to flip them around.
I am experiencing interference...
